mapper.select: SELECT prog_id AS progId, prog_nm AS progNm, sport_id AS sportId, type_cd AS typeCd, use_yn AS useYn, one_time_amt AS oneTimeAmt, rwd_game_point AS rwdGamePoint, reg_dt AS regDt, upd_dt AS updDt, detail_type_cd AS detailTypeCd FROM program ORDER BY reg_dt DESC

SELECT prog_id AS progId, prog_nm AS progNm, sport_id AS sportId, type_cd AS typeCd, use_yn AS useYn, one_time_amt AS oneTimeAmt, rwd_game_point AS rwdGamePoint, reg_dt AS regDt, upd_dt AS updDt, detail_type_cd AS detailTypeCd FROM program WHERE prog_id = #{progId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO program ( prog_nm, sport_id, type_cd, use_yn, one_time_amt, rwd_game_point, reg_dt, upd_dt, detail_type_cd ) VALUES ( #{progNm}, #{sportId}, #{typeCd}, #{useYn}, #{oneTimeAmt}, #{rwdGamePoint}, #{regDt}, #{updDt}, #{detailTypeCd} )
mapper.update: UPDATE program SET prog_nm = #{progNm}, sport_id = #{sportId}, type_cd = #{typeCd}, use_yn = #{useYn}, one_time_amt = #{oneTimeAmt}, rwd_game_point = #{rwdGamePoint}, upd_dt = #{updDt}, detail_type_cd = #{detailTypeCd} WHERE prog_id = #{progId}
